speaker: President.
english: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0359/2008 ) by Ieke van den Burg and Daniel Dăianu, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on Lamfalussy follow-up: future structure of supervision [ 2008/2148(INI) ].
